videos.description: Kemba Walker converts on the and-1 late in the game against the Mavericks, adding to his 41-point performance.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Walker gets the tough bucket in the lane) 2018/01/10 ESHEET

videos.headline: Walker gets the tough bucket in the lane
